hero.title: Rent Heavy Machinery
hero.subtitle: Find, compare, and rent the best construction equipment for your next project. Fast, reliable, and affordable.

item1.title: Wide Selection
item1.description: Browse a large catalog of excavators, loaders, cranes and more.

item2.title: Trusted Partners
item2.description: We work with vetted suppliers to ensure quality and safety.

item3.title: Fast Booking
item3.description: Reserve equipment in minutes with transparent pricing.

inventory.title: Equipment Categories
inventory.subtitle: Browse our extensive catalog of quality equipment across major categories

smallEquipment.title: Small Equipment Rentals
smallEquipment.subtitle: We've expanded our inventory to include high-quality small equipment perfect for events, travel, home projects, and more.

sectionHeader.title: Everything You Need For Your Project
sectionHeader.subtitle: Our rental platform is designed to make equipment rental seamless, convenient, and reliable at every step.

rental.title: Equipment Rental
rental.description: Access a vast catalog of well-maintained equipment for any project

inventory.title: Extensive Inventory
inventory.description: From hand tools to heavy machinery, find exactly what you need for any job size.

search.title: Advanced Search
search.description: Filter by project type, tool category, brand, or specifications to quickly find the perfect equipment.

quality.title: Quality Guaranteed
quality.description: All equipment is regularly serviced, inspected, and tested before each rental.

logistics.title: Delivery & Logistics
logistics.description: Reliable, on-time delivery and pickup services for your convenience

sameDay.title: Same-Day Delivery
sameDay.description: Get equipment delivered within hours for urgent project needs in service areas.

scheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
scheduling.description: Schedule deliveries and pickups at your convenience with precise time windows.

tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.description: Track your equipment delivery in real-time and receive ETA notifications.

payment.title: Simplified Payments
payment.description: Transparent pricing and flexible payment options for businesses and individuals

options.title: Multiple Payment Options
options.description: Pay with credit cards, ACH transfers, digital wallets, or approved corporate accounts.

rates.title: Hourly to Monthly Rates
rates.description: Flexible rental periods with decreasing rates for longer rentals to match your project timeline.

insights.title: Business Insights
insights.description: Track spending by project, department, or location with detailed reporting for business customers.

small.title: Small Equipment
small.description: Quality small equipment for events, travel, and home needs

photography.title: Photography & Video
photography.description: Professional cameras, lenses, and accessories for any photography or video project.

kitchen.title: Kitchen & Event
kitchen.description: Blenders, food processors, and other kitchen equipment for events and gatherings.

climate.title: Climate Control
climate.description: Portable AC units, heaters, and air purifiers for comfort in any environment.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Find the perfect equipment for your next project in minutes. No commitments, no hassles.

about.title: About Us
about.content: Tezrent connects contractors with reliable machinery suppliers to keep projects moving.
